CustomField.description: Sum for all Account Contacts: Total gifts (Rec'd, Rec'd as Uncond. Pledge), hard/soft credit, Currency Type = EUR. Excl. In-Kind and Planned Gift). DLRS.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The sum of Amount of all received EUR Opportunities where the Account has a hard or soft credit (Planned Gifts not included).
CustomField.label: Total Amount Committed Lifetime EUR
